titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Washington State Centennial Commission Time Capsule Packet 1989-1990
Washington State Centennial Commission Time Capsule Packet
titlestmt.author: Cheryl Gunselman

publicationstmt.publisher: Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections, Washington State University Libraries

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-05-29.
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS 2nd Edition ( Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

repository.corpname: Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections, Washington State University Libraries

did.unittitle: Washington State Centennial Commission Time Capsule Packet
did.abstract: Packet of materials related to the Washington State Centennial Time Capsule, and a file of accompanying documentation.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a sealed packet of materials related to the Washington State Centennial Time Capsule, and a file of accompanying documentation. The packet is one of 12 copies created, sealed and placed with cultural heritage repositories in Washington State. The original materials were placed in the custody of the Washington State Archivist.

accessrestrict.p: The sealed packet in this collection is restricted: "Not to be opened prior to 2014...not to be opened in any case without a request, in writing, from the Secretary of State's Office or the designated head of the Keeper organization" (from the collection documentation materials filed with the collection). The file of accompanying documentation is open and available for research use.

processinfo.p: Cheryl Gunselman processed this collection in 2018.

acqinfo.p: Washington Secretary of State Ralph Munro transferred this collection to the Washington State University Libraries in 1990 (MS.1990.64).

prefercite.p: Washington State Centennial Commission Time Capsule Packet; Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections; Washington State University Libraries.
